entry.title: Monster Mash Cereal - 16oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: General Mills
Type: Snacks
Price: 11.99

They Did The Mash...

The MONSTER MASH!

Breakfast of Sweeties

For the first time ever, The Monsters are coming together in one scary delicious bowl of cereal! All of the classic monster-based brands: Count Chocula, Franken Berry, Boo Berry, Yummy Mummy, and Fruit Brute – are joining forces for the mashup cereal. 
This mashup celebrates the 50th birthday of the line’s launch with the Count Chocula and Franken Berry cereals back in 1971. Boo Berry followed in 1973, with Fruit Brute coming along in 1974 and Yummy Mummy in 1988. 
This rocking cereal is only produced by General Mills during the Halloween season and available for a limited time!
 
﻿16 oz (453g) - Family Size

Sour Green Apple

entry.title: Rowntree's Randoms Foamies Pouch - 140g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Candy
Price: 4.59

Completely Unpredictable!

Like a fluffy pillow for your mouth!

Rowntree's® Randoms Foamies boast a fun and random assortment of gummy candies! Originally from the UK, this package of delightfully foamy sweet flavoured treats is a perfect snack for all ages. With prominnet flavours of strawberry biscuit and ice-cream biscuit. From ping-pong paddles to paintbrushes, ice cream cones to saxophones, every bag contains billions of possible combinations of textures, shapes, colours and flavours. You never know what you're going to get! 


140 g

Price: 4.47

Bursting with yummy juiciness!

Rowntree's® Randoms Juicers boast a fun and random assortment of gummy candies! Originally from the UK, this package of soft fruity-flavoured chewy sweets filled with a liquid center is a perfect snack for all ages. From ping-pong paddles to paintbrushes, ice cream cones to saxophones, every bag contains billions of possible combinations of textures, shapes, colours and flavours. You never know what you're going to get! A squishy, juicy experience that is beyond words!

140 g

entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Snacks
Price: 24.99

Retro American Cereal

Breakfast of Sweeties

Introduced in Halloween in 1971, this mix of cereal and marshmallows has a distinct chocolate flavour and is only produced by General Mills during the halloween season. Pick yours up today before they run off scared!

entry.title: Doritos Twisted Lime - 18.8oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frito-Lay Inc
Type: Snacks
Price: 14.99

BACK FOR A LIMITED TIME

The Long-Awaited Return of...

 Doritos Twisted Lime 

American Snacks | Potato Chips

If you love Doritos, you must try these! With a citrusy flavour and a sour bite at the end, your mouth will be watering. The bag is so big which makes it the perfect movie night snack to munch on. Doritos released this new flavour last year and they definitely were a fan favourite. This time they are back and very exclusive...


Don't wait any longer! Order today and discover what you've been missing out on!

1 family size bag - 18.8oz

Fresh Snacks Shipped Within Canada & to USA! 

Ingredients

Corn Flour, Vegetable Oil (Corn, Canola, and/or Sunflower), Salt, Cheddar Cheese (Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Whey, Spices, Maltodextrin (Made From Corn), Monosodium Glutamate, Buttermilk, Romano Cheese (Cow’s Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Natural and Artificial Flavors, Onion Powder, Baking Soda, Whey Protein Concentrate, Tomato Powder, Citric Acid, Garlic Powder, Potassium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Monoglycerides, Artificial Color (Yellow 6, Yellow 5, Yellow 6 Lake, Blue 2 Lake), Disodium Inosinate, and Disodium Guanylate. CONTAINS MILK INGREDIENTS.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labeling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data. We cannot be held responsible for the accuracy of ingredients or nutritional information provided, nor liable for any reactions caused by the products we sell.

A Recipe For Monstrous Fun!

    Ever wondered what a slime monster would taste like? Take a bite and find out! These tangy Jelly Buddies will overwhelm your senses with (spoiler alert!) Lemon, Mango, Orange, and Tropical flavour, all made with natural fruit juice.

     Also made 100% halal and free from the top 10 allergens, these delicious ghouls are a fun and safe treat that everyone is able to enjoy!

entry.title: Sour Punch Mini Bites Assorted Pouch - 3.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Embrace Your Punch

Sour Punch Mini Bites Assorted Flavours 

Enjoy Sour Punches iconic straws in mini form! 3 flavors of sour candy per bag: Blue Raspberry, Green Apple & Strawberry.

These soft & chewy candy bites are covered in the classic sour sugar coating and come in small bite-sized pieces. What is awesome about this candy is that it comes in a resealable bag! It will perfectly fit in your backpack or purse for a on-the-go snack. You can even try pairing these sour fruity candies with a snack like popcorn!

  • Low Fat
  • Low Sodium
  • Kosher & Halal Certified

3.5oz

15 MINUTE PREP

entry.title: Mike and Ike Sour Lemon - 24ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Just Born
Type: Candy
Price: 11.99

 Sour Citrusy Mike and Ike's for On-The-Go

    So you forgot your lemon ginger shot at home and now you're looking for some way to get your tangy, citrus fix? Try this sweet and sour alternative, Mike and Ike's Sour Lemon! Each pack contains a burst of fruity Lemon flavoured Mike and Ike's that'll leave your tastebuds stunned. 
    This box comes with 24 mini-packs that are perfect to take with you wherever you go. Whether you down the pack in one gulp, or share with your friends, we'll support you any way you want to enjoy your candy. 

Perfect for keeping your favourite treat in stock, for lunch boxes, or on-the-go snacks!
